languages.text: "Да, Ваша Светлость. От лица моей организации выражаю сожаление, что нам {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}не удалось выстроить продуктивные деловые отношения{/d}. Но я надеюсь, что это... временная сложность, и вы увидите, сколь интересные перспективы мы можем предложить".

"Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. On behalf of my organisation, I would like to express our regret that we have been {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}unable to establish a productive business relationship{/d}. But that, I hope, is... a temporary complication, and you will eventually see the potential and promise of what we can offer you."
languages.original_text: "Да, Ваша Светлость. От лица моей организации выражаю сожаление, что нам {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}не удалось выстроить продуктивные деловые отношения{/d}. Но я надеюсь, что это... временная сложность, и вы увидите, сколь интересные перспективы мы можем предложить".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. On behalf of my organisation, I would like to express our regret that we have been unable to establish a productive business relationship. But that, I hope, is... a temporary complication, and you will eventually see the potential and promise of what we can offer you."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

But that, I hope, is... a temporary complication, and you will eventually see the potential and promise of what we can offer you."

But that, I hope, is... a temporary complication, and you will eventually see the potential and promise of what we can offer you."

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. On behalf of my organisation, I would like to express our regret that we have been {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}unable to establish a productive business relationship{/d}. But that, I hope, is... a temporary complication, and you will eventually see the potential and promise of what we can offer you."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “是的，大人。我谨代表我的组织，对我们{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}未能建立富有成效的业务关系{/d}表示遗憾。但我希望，这仅仅是……暂时的麻烦，我希望您最终能看到我们能为您带来的潜在受益。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. On behalf of my organisation, I would like to express our regret that we have been {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}unable to establish a productive business relationship{/d}. But that, I hope, is... a temporary complication, and you will eventually see the potential and promise of what we can offer you."

traits.locale_text: “是的，大人。我谨代表我的组织，对我们未能建立富有成效的业务关系表示遗憾。但我希望，这仅仅是……暂时的麻烦，我希望您最终能看到我们能为您带来的潜在受益。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「はい、陛下。我が組織の代表として、{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}実りあるビジネス関係を築くことができなかった{/d}ことを、残念に思います。しかし、これは…一時的な問題です。きっと、私たちが提供できる可能性と誓いを、いつか理解していただけるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. On behalf of my organisation, I would like to express our regret that we have been {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}unable to establish a productive business relationship{/d}. But that, I hope, is... a temporary complication, and you will eventually see the potential and promise of what we can offer you."

traits.locale_text: 「はい、陛下。我が組織の代表として、{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}実りあるビジネス関係を築くことができなかった{/d}ことを、残念に思います。しかし、これは…一時的な問題です。きっと、私たちが提供できる可能性と誓いを、いつか理解していただけるでしょう」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. En nombre de mi organización, me gustaría expresar nuestro pesar por {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}no haber podido establecer una relación comercial productiva{/d}. Espero que sea algo temporal y que acabe viendo el potencial de lo que podemos ofrecerle».
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. On behalf of my organisation, I would like to express our regret that we have been {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}unable to establish a productive business relationship{/d}. But that, I hope, is... a temporary complication, and you will eventually see the potential and promise of what we can offer you."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. En nombre de mi organización, me gustaría expresar nuestro pesar por no haber podido establecer una relación comercial productiva. Espero que sea algo temporal y que acabe viendo el potencial de lo que podemos ofrecerle».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ja, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Im Namen meiner Organisation möchte ich unserem Bedauern darüber Ausdruck verleihen, dass wir {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}keine produktive Geschäftsbeziehung aufbauen konnten{/d}. Doch das, so hoffe ich, ist nur eine ... vorübergehende Komplikation und Ihr werdet eines Tages erkennen, welches Potenzial wir für Euch haben."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. On behalf of my organisation, I would like to express our regret that we have been {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}unable to establish a productive business relationship{/d}. But that, I hope, is... a temporary complication, and you will eventually see the potential and promise of what we can offer you."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Im Namen meiner Organisation möchte ich unserem Bedauern darüber Ausdruck verleihen, dass wir keine produktive Geschäftsbeziehung aufbauen konnten. Doch das, so hoffe ich, ist nur eine ... vorübergehende Komplikation und Ihr werdet eines Tages erkennen, welches Potenzial wir für Euch haben."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Oui, Votre Seigneurie. Au nom de mon organisation, je regrette que nous {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}n'ayons pas pu établir une relation commerciale productive{/d}. J'espère cependant qu'il ne s'agit là que d'une complication... temporaire et que vous finirez par voir le potentiel de tout ce que nous pouvons vous offrir. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. On behalf of my organisation, I would like to express our regret that we have been {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}unable to establish a productive business relationship{/d}. But that, I hope, is... a temporary complication, and you will eventually see the potential and promise of what we can offer you."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, Votre Seigneurie. Au nom de mon organisation, je regrette que nous n'ayons pas pu établir une relation commerciale productive. J'espère cependant qu'il ne s'agit là que d'une complication... temporaire et que vous finirez par voir le potentiel de tout ce que nous pouvons vous offrir. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Evet {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Organizasyonum adına, sizinle {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}verimli bir iş ilişkisi kuramamış olmamızın{/d} pişmanlığını ifade etmeme müsaade buyurun. Yine de umuyorum ki bu, geçici bir pürüzdür ve size sunabileceğimiz şeylerin potansiyelini ve güvenilirliğini zaman içerisinde göreceksinizdir."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. On behalf of my organisation, I would like to express our regret that we have been {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}unable to establish a productive business relationship{/d}. But that, I hope, is... a temporary complication, and you will eventually see the potential and promise of what we can offer you."

traits.locale_text: "Evet {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Organizasyonum adına, sizinle {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}verimli bir iş ilişkisi kuramamış olmamızın{/d} pişmanlığını ifade etmeme izin verin. Ama umuyorum ki bu, geçici bir pürüzdür ve size sunabileceğimiz şeylerin potansiyelini ve güvenilirliğini zaman içerisinde göreceksinizdir."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
